page.title: 04Richmond. The doctor.
page.content:
When I go to the doctors I feel a sense of dread, that what I have got is serious yet still I go on with it. When I get to the doctor's office I knock on his door and he says come in so I do. When I'm in there he tells me to lie down on the bed. When I am on it he rolls my jumper up and puts his stethascope on my stomach and back, it is freezing cold.Then I roll my jumper down and he tells me to open my mouth so I do. After that he gives me a prescription.Then I go out and down to the chemist and get my medicine.Then after that I go home.
Kelvin Stribblehill
